p: It was invented 40 years ago by a joint consortium of Russian scientists arbidol has been employed in China since 2006 for the treatment and prophylaxis of human pulmonary diseases caused by influenza A and B viruses and of other human pathogenic respiratory viruses and it has been present in the Russian market for 20 years [ 71]. It has also proven useful for the prevention of the epidemic of poultry flu in China. Its clinical efficacy was first reported and published in Russia in the 1990s [ 71, 72]. It is cost-effective in prophylactic and curative treatments, against acute respiratory viral infections [ 72].
